website_summaries.verdict: Simple and classic design; a high-quality flower press that works well for larger projects.
pros: Adults like it for pressing wedding bouquets
Sturdy and small enough to bring on hikes and travel
cons: A lot of loose parts to keep track of
Straps strong for most jobs, but break for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as they claim.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fairly nice press, although I must say I'm a bit upset about the durability of the straps. We bought this about 2 weeks ago to preserve flowers from my wife's wedding boquet, and, per the instructions, I've been tightening the straps every day. Today, I broke one of the straps. They say 'the hook & loop straps will hold more pressure than you can put on them!' but clearly that's not true. In any case, it seems well built and I'm assuming I just overdid it on the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tool when pressing flowers and leaves and it does a great job. It comes complete with everything you need. I'm looking forward to years of pressing fun and then making cards to send to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This flower press works great! Strong straps
customer_reviews.text: This flower press works great! Strong straps. The smaller size is great to put in your backpack while hiking. I definitely recommend the extension pack though as it fills up fast...
customer_reviews.author: mountain wanderer

customer_reviews.title: As a first time "presser" I found this very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As a first time "presser" I found this very easy to use. My rose petals & lavender pressed beautifully and retained their colour! Stupid easy to use and great tips in the little booklet. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got into plant pressing and this kit is a great way to start! It's small, simple, and the belts are easy to use. So far, I've pressed one batch of plants and they came out beautiful. It's also easy to carry around. It comes with many good ideas with how to use your pressed plants. This shipping was pretty quick, about a week or so. I was actually quite surprised with how small it is, but it can hold a lot of stuff! The price seemed a little high but it works well and hasn't snapped. Thanks for the awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for flower lovers
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using this flower press. It is something I have wanted to do for a long time, and the results were great. I did this project with my 7 year old granddaughter and she, being very artistic, made a lovely framed picture with the pressed flowers. Wonderful fun!
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother as a gift and she loves it. You can press a lot of flowers at once and from what she has shown me, they turn out lovely. I usually just press flowers in books, but I consider this worth the cost because it is so pretty. It looks beautiful just sitting on a table as a decoration as well as being a flower press.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Marconi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. If you’re on the go and love taking a little piece of nature with you, this is for you. It’s small, cute, and good quality. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: ... leaf clovers so I thought this would be a great Christmas gift it came and it was well shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend collects 4 leaf clovers so I thought this would be a great Christmas gift it came and it was well shipped all the items were together seems to be a very nice kit and I'm excited to gift it and use it !!! Great kit especially for the price thank you !
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for wedding flowers
customer_reviews.text: Used this to press and preserve flowers from wedding bouquets. Worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Clear Sky

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little press. Easy to use. Would recommend to any crafter.
customer_reviews.author: Gail  Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory plant press
customer_reviews.text: This is a small leaf press that has worked well for me for leaves and flowers. It's not huge but the only thing I have picked that was too large was a big fern frond. It has handled everything else I have found. I pressed dozens of fall leaves this past autumn and after 4 days to a week in the press they were fine to be coated with modge podge and used for Thanksgiving garlands.
customer_reviews.author: SRA

customer_reviews.title: The press is sturdy and so much easier than the books and bricks ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well, although I have only used it once so far. The press is sturdy and so much easier than the books and bricks I was using before I got the press!
customer_reviews.author: catbillou

customer_reviews.title: This is a great flower press- delivered promptly- just in time for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flower press- delivered promptly- just in time for a fall leaf class project for my grandson. He was so excited to use it and the leaves dried perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Samwise Gamgee

customer_reviews.title: nifty portable plant press
customer_reviews.text: bought this to pack around on hikes and i love it! it is super light and portable, perfect for small samples
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Currie

customer_reviews.title: Great flower press: easy, pretty and reasonably prices1
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was really nice, there were pretty and clear instructions which made it easy to use! A great gift for any lover of flowers and nature
customer_reviews.author: starshroom108

customer_reviews.title: Really great product, bought it for my mom for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great product, bought it for my mom for Christmas and she loved it; we've done several pressings together and they've turned out great. Great for beginnings.
customer_reviews.author: whiterabbit

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It arrived very quickly and I completely filled the book the first day I had it in my home. Can't wait to order more pages!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Byrum

customer_reviews.title: great starter plant press
customer_reviews.text: Perfect press with sturdy straps and everything you need to start.
customer_reviews.author: Laurabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I'm taking this on a trip abroad
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I'm taking this on a trip abroad, so I can press flowers and create keepsakes from my trip. So I'll add to my review upon my return to say how well it actually worked. For now I'm giving it 4 stars because I feel for the price it should have came with extra blotting paper. Update: Still luv it! Worked great for small to medium flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Lonneé Ray

customer_reviews.title: it's nice to not have to use a ton of books
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Dries the flowers really well, and with the straps, it's nice to not have to use a ton of books.
customer_reviews.author: mcdkimber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids and I had a blast in this easy to use leaf press
customer_reviews.author: Elise Cormier

customer_reviews.title: First flower press
customer_reviews.text: Works great! First flower press I've used and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: has a very nice presence to it
customer_reviews.text: Giving as a gift. has a very nice presence to it. I'm sure she will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Moechnig

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: The actual flower press didn't look like the one shown in the photo at all. The photo is misleading. There were no cute colorful little flowers on it. Thankfully Amazon allowed me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Maybe a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Great press a little expensive but not though to take a star off. It’s high quality and looks like it’s going to last me for years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great order turn around and wife was totally surprised. Great job
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not gifted yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it won't be given until the holidays so I can't say how it will work. But having seen other presses, I like that this one seems very sturdy and is rectangular and a little larger than some which will make it easier to use for bigger flowers and leaves.
customer_reviews.author: S. Signore

product_meta.title: Natures Pressed Flower & Leaf Press 7 X 9 Nature Press (For Pressing Leaves & Flowers)
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackOur most popular sized press! The plywood is extra strong and the hook & loop straps will hold more pressure than you can put on them! Top this off with a super strong metal buckle and you're ready to go! It includes 6 corrugated ventilators and 10 sheets of blotter paper. An easy to follow instruction / project ideas sheet is also included.
feature_bullets: Easy to follow instruction / project ideas sheet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
